text: Need Victoria Carter for Pillow Talk campaign. Budget around $6,802, looking for 2 x 10-minute unboxing, 3 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x Instagram story, 2 x Instagram story, 3 x Facebook story. 6 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 11 months. Engagement period: 3 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $6,802 budget
